price: 他曾检阅众鸟，他说：“我怎么不见戴胜呢？它缺席吗？
arabic: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَالِيَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلۡهُدۡهُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: watafaqqada al-ṭayra faqāla mā liya lā arā al-hud'huda am kāna mina al-ghāibīna
